ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( REGEX( PostalCode, "[0-9]{5}"), REGEX( PostalCode, "[0-9]{5}-[0-9]{4}"), REGEX( PostalCode, "[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1} [0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}"), REGEX( PostalCode, "[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1}-[0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}"), REGEX( PostalCode, "[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{1}"), BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"NSS"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Oasis"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Enablement"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Marketing"), $User.LastName = "User", $User.Sales_Division__c = "Virtual SMB Inbound" ) )
